explain: a small animal (such as a mouse, rat, squirrel, or beaver) that has sharp front teeth
to know and remember (someone or something) because of previous knowledge or experience
having pieces of skin that connect all the toes on a foot
the conditions that surround someone or something
to keep in a certain state, position, or activity
to make by putting together materials and parts
having or producing a lot of physical strength or force
statement: Some people are scared of rodents.
You can recognize beavers by their large front teeth.
He gave her a quick glance and smiled.
These animals were raised in a controlled environment.
Regular exercise is vital for your health.
Beavers have maintained the health of water systems by building lodges and dams.
It took them two years to construct the bridge.
He piled the books on top of each other.
